abstract: It's not Napa, but it has some outstanding wines and lovely scenery.
snippet: It's not Napa, but it has some outstanding wines and lovely scenery.
lead_paragraph: The Finger Lakes in west-central New York State fits very few of the preconceptions many people have about wine regions. Forget about the glitz and conspicuous consumption associated with Napa Valley, or even the bucolic wealth and gracious living emblematic of what Robert Mondavi used to call the good life.

headline.main: The Good Life Comes a Little Harder in the Finger Lakes
